1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    -- * Message
8    divideByZero,
9    heteroDecimal,
10    notDate, notMonthlyDate, notWeeklyDate, notYearlyDate,
11    tooLargeDigit,
12    notNumber,
13    abortEncodables,
14    encodableLines,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture   as O
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base       as B
19
20-- | Divide by zero
21divideByZero :: B.Ab a
22divideByZero = B.leftBecause "Divide by zero"
23
24-- | Different decimal length
25heteroDecimal :: (B.MixEncode c) => c -> c -> B.Ab a
26heteroDecimal a b = Left $ abortEncodables "Different decimal length" [a, b]
27
28-- | Can't read as date
29notDate :: Integer -> Int -> Int -> B.Ab a
30notDate y m d = notMonthlyDate y m d
31
32-- | Not monthly date
33notMonthlyDate :: Integer -> Int -> Int -> B.Ab a
34notMonthlyDate y m d =
35    B.leftLines "Not monthly date"
36             [ "/year  " ++ show y
37             , "/month " ++ show m
38             , "/day   " ++ show d]
39
40-- | Not weekly date
41notWeeklyDate :: Integer -> Int -> Int -> B.Ab a
42notWeeklyDate y w d =
43    B.leftLines "Not weekly date"
44             [ "/year  " ++ show y
45             , "/week  " ++ show w
46             , "/day   " ++ show d]
47
48-- | Not yearly date
49notYearlyDate :: Integer -> Int -> B.Ab a
50notYearlyDate y d =
51    B.leftLines "Not yearly date"
52             [ "/year  " ++ show y
53             , "/day   " ++ show d]
54
55-- | Too large digit
56tooLargeDigit :: String -> B.Ab a
57tooLargeDigit = B.leftLine "Too large digit"
58
59-- | Can't read as number
60notNumber :: String -> B.Ab a
61notNumber = B.leftLine "Can't read as number"
62
63-- | Abort reason with encodable values.
64abortEncodables :: (B.MixEncode c) => String -> [c] -> B.AbortReason
65abortEncodables msg cs = B.abortLines msg $ encodableLines cs
66
67-- | Numbered lines of encodables.
68encodableLines :: (B.MixEncode c) => [c] -> [String]
69encodableLines = zipWith f (O.ints 1) where
70    f i c = "#" ++ show i ++ " = " ++ B.encode c
